text: Mary Hollis Inboden (born 1986) is an American actress and writer best known for appearing on The Real O'Neals. ==Early life== Inboden is a survivor of the 1998 Westside Middle School shooting in Jonesboro, Arkansas which occurred when she was 12 years old. ==Career== In 2011, Inboden, working with The New Colony theatre company, collaborated on a script based on her experiences as a survivor of a school shooting. The play was named The Warriors and premiered in 2011 in Chicago. A subsequent benefit performance was performed after the Sandy Hook Elementary School shooting. Inboden began working in television in 2011 appearing in The Chicago Code. In 2016 she was a series regular on The Real O'Neals. The show ran for two seasons before being cancelled in 2017. In 2019, Inboden appeared as a regular on American Princess. ==Filmography== {| class="wikitable sortable" |+ Television and film roles |- ! Year ! Title !
